member.name: M:DataApp.Controllers.CarController.Get
member.summary: A demo endpoint that returns the first 5 cars from the Main.CarsDB table.

member.name: M:DataApp.Controllers.CarController.Get(System.Int64)
member.summary: Returns a car from the Main.CarsDB by car id.
member.param: the car id (Rowid) in the database.

member.name: M:DataApp.Controllers.CarController.Post(DataApp.Models.Car)
member.summary: Adds a new car to the Main.CarsDB table.
member.returns: Returns the car with the rowid populated.

member.name: M:DataApp.Controllers.CarController.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Deletes a car from the Main.CarsDB by car id.
member.returns: boolean whether the car has been deleted.
